When I repeated the same Open Declaration again it succeded!

The NPE can no longer occur. However, there may be an underlying problem as I do not understand how the exception could have been triggered.

Do you know, whether the indexer was running at the time the exception occured?
Did you previously terminate a workbench-session on the same workspace?

(In reply to comment #1)
> Do you know, whether the indexer was running at the time the exception occured?

No.
